mapper.insert: insert into keypair_standby( pub_key, pri_key, kpg_algorithm, km_kpg_task, gen_time )values( #{pubKey}, #{priKey}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.algorithmName}, #{KpgTask.name}, #{genTime} )
mapper.select: select id, pub_key as pubKey, pri_key as priKey, kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, km_kpg_task as kpgTask, gen_time as genTime from keypair_standby
